title: 300 sadhus in Jaipur tested positive for COVID-19 after smoking from the same pipe? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A few screenshots of media reports are being shared on social media, with claims that 300 sadhus in Jaipur tested positive for COVID-19 after they smoked from the same Chillum (pipe).

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

We ran a search, using relevant keywords and found a tweet by Press Information Bureau, Jharkhand.

Rubbishing the above news, PIB said, “according to the District Collector, Jaipur, there is no veracity of this news and no such incident has been reported.”

This proves that the viral news is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
